DOC.brief_summary: Study examine safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics BI 1356 BS administer healthy male volunteer single rise oral dos ( 1 mg , 2.5 mg , 5 mg , 10 mg ) multiple rise oral dos ( 2.5 mg , 5 mg , 10 mg daily 12 day )
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics Single Rising Oral Doses Multiple Rising Oral Doses BI 1356 BS Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subjects healthy male volunteer meet criterion : Persons without clinically remarkable finding clinically evident complication base concurrent illness , past medical history , physical examination , vital sign ( blood pressure ( BP ) , pulse rate ( PR ) , body temperature ) , 12lead Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , laboratory test result Persons 20 old 35 young Persons BMI 17.6 kg/m2 29.9 kg/m2 less Persons willing participate trial study initiation give write consent accordance GCP ( Good Clinical Practice , MHW Ordinance No . 28 date March 27 , 1997 ) Persons deviate norm show clinical finding ( BP , PR , ECG ) consultation Persons clinically relevant complication Persons gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immune , hormonal disorder Persons central nervous system disorder ( e.g. , epilepsy ) , mental disorder , neurological disorder Persons history significant orthostatic hypotension , syncopal attack , blackout Persons chronic infection severe acute infection Persons history severe allergy/hypersensitivity include allergy drug inactive ingredient Persons receive drug long halflife ( 24 hour ) within month treatment trial , within period 10 time longer halflife drug , study Persons receive drug may theoretically affect study result base information obtain time preparation protocol within 10 day treatment study Persons participate another trial investigational drug within 4 month treatment study Smokers ( smoke 10 cigarette 3 cigar 3 pipe per day ) Persons abstain smoke throughout study Persons undoubtedly abuse alcohol Persons abuse drug Persons donate blood 100 mL within 4 week treatment Persons perform rigorous exercise ( within week treatment study ) Persons laboratory test result outside reference range result consider clinically relevant change Persons obey diet rule trial site Persons ECG value outside reference range clinical importance . Examples include , limited , QRS interval > 120 m
